articles.author: Ankita Sen
articles.title: Mass Twitter layoffs put H-1B visa holders in an immigration limbo - Economic Times
articles.description: According to a National Foundation for American Policy analysis of US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) data, there are about 625 to 670 Twitter employees in H-1B status, or about 8% of the companys 7,500 employees. Out of the 50% manpower cut anno…
articles.content:
Elon Musk's massive firing spree across Twitter has put some employees on a 60-day deadline, and their immigration status under threat.
Twitter employees working on American work visas, like the H-1… [+4092 chars]

articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips, USA TODAY
articles.title: Can daylight saving time harm your sleep? Yes, medical experts say - USA TODAY
articles.description: In 2020, the American Academy of Sleep Medicine called for the U.S. to eliminate daylight savings time and adopt year-round standard time nationwide.
articles.content:
Medical experts are continuing to stress daylight saving time's health consequences – notably how time changes can throw off your sleep cycle.
"It's the same story every year," Dr. Sabra Abbott, a N… [+5343 chars]

articles.title: American Jailed For 4 Weeks For Slapping Singapore Airlines Crew Member - NDTV
articles.description: An American whose bomb hoax on a commercial flight prompted Singapore to scramble fighter jets was sentenced to four weeks in prison today, after a court found him guilty of causing hurt by slapping a cabin crew member.
articles.content:
The plane had to be escorted to Singapore by fighter jets. (Representational)
Singapore: An American whose bomb hoax on a commercial flight prompted Singapore to scramble fighter jets was sentenced … [+1269 chars]
